Corporate+Digital Transformation+Automat.EXPLANATION: Percentage of organizational processes that have been automated compared to the total number of processes.
Corporate+Digital Transformation+Automat.FORMULA: (Number of Automated Processes / Total Number of Processes) * 100

Corporate+Digital Transformation+Automat.EXPLANATION: Cost or time savings achieved through automation, calculated as the difference between pre- and post-automation metrics.
Corporate+Digital Transformation+Automat.FORMULA: (Cost/Time Savings from Automation / Total Cost/Time of Automation Initiatives) * 100

Corporate+Digital Transformation+Automat.KPIS: Error reduction rate due to automation.
Corporate+Digital Transformation+Automat.EXPLANATION: Reduction in error rates in processes due to the implementation of automation, measured as a percentage decrease in errors.
Corporate+Digital Transformation+Automat.FORMULA: (Number of Errors Reduced Due to Automation / Total Number of Errors) * 100

Corporate+Digital Transformation+Automat.EXPLANATION: Percentage of users who adopt and utilize new automation technologies or processes compared to those eligible to use them.
Corporate+Digital Transformation+Automat.FORMULA: (Number of Users Adopting Automation / Total Number of Users) * 100

Corporate+Digital Transformation+Automat.KPIS: Return on investment (ROI) from automation projects.
Corporate+Digital Transformation+Automat.EXPLANATION: Financial return from automation projects, calculated as the ratio of benefits gained to the costs of the projects.
Corporate+Digital Transformation+Automat.FORMULA: (Net Benefit from Automation Projects / Total Cost of Automation Projects) * 100

Corporate+Digital Transformation+Automat.EXPLANATION: Measure of the operational uptime and reliability of automated systems, including the frequency and duration of outages.
Corporate+Digital Transformation+Automat.FORMULA: (Total Uptime of Automated Systems / Total Time for Automated Systems) * 100

Corporate+Digital Transformation+Automat.EXPLANATION: Total count of tasks or processes that have been automated within the organization.

Corporate+Digital Transformation+Automat.KPIS: Automation maintenance and support cost per process.
Corporate+Digital Transformation+Automat.EXPLANATION: Average cost for maintaining and supporting each automated process, including troubleshooting and regular updates.
Corporate+Digital Transformation+Automat.FORMULA: Total Maintenance and Support Costs for Automation / Total Number of Automated Processes
